chunk:
The Inkey List, Lactic Acid

Brand: The Inkey List

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Brand: The Inkey List

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Water (Aqua / Eau), Lactic Acid, Propanediol, Glycerin, Sodium Hydroxide, PPG-26-Buteth-26, Sodium Hyaluronate, Phenoxyethanol, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Ethylhexylglycer- in, Trisodium Ethylenedi- amine Disuccinate, Agastache Mexicana Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract.

Directions: After cleansing and Hyaluronic Acid if you are using it, pat one to two drops on to face and neck. Follow with other serums, moisturizer, oil or both depending on preference.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
